Name: Amazon
Prep Tips: Practice LP stories; narrate tradeoffs; confirm constraints; test quickly.
What Makes It Different vs OA: More interactive: questions, hints, tradeoffs; LP probing integrated.

Name: Google
DSA Depth: Medium to Hard; emphasis on clarity
Prep Tips: Restate problem; propose approach; analyze complexity; handle edge cases.
What Makes It Different vs OA: OA is timed and solitary; phone screen rewards communication and structured thinking.

Name: Meta
Prep Tips: Pattern drill; timeboxing; speak while coding; verify with examples.
What Makes It Different vs OA: OA measures completion; screen measures how you think while coding under time.

Name: Microsoft
Prep Tips: Ask clarifying questions; propose multiple approaches; be coachable.
What Makes It Different vs OA: More conversational than OA; interviewer may pivot based on your choices.

Name: Uber
Prep Tips: Focus on correctness first; write clean code; discuss tradeoffs and failure modes.
What Makes It Different vs OA: Often more pragmatic than OA; may emphasize robustness and assumptions.

Name: Atlassian
Prep Tips: Talk through design; write readable code; incorporate feedback quickly.
What Makes It Different vs OA: Less like exam, more like pair problem solving; values alignment matters later.
